name: mithril-reckoning
description: Mithril Reckoning - A Legendary Javascript Calendar

scripts.build:css: node-sass --include-path ./node_modules --output-style compressed ./src/scss/demo.scss ./dist/css/demo.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' ./dist/css/demo.css -r true
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm build:favicon && npm build:bower
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:demojs -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run watch:html -s"
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:favicon && npm run build:bower && parallelshell "npm run watch" "npm run serve" "npm run open:dev -s"
